DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Safety And Toleration Of A Single Dose Of PF-04418948 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m^2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . A positive urine drug screen . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 21 drinks/week male .
